Uses of Class
energy.usef.core.service.helper.AbstractTriggerRegisterHelperService

  • Packages that use AbstractTriggerRegisterHelperService 
    Package Description
    energy.usef.agr.workflow.nonudi.initialize
    Workflow classes for Non-UDI initialization of the Aggregator.
    energy.usef.agr.workflow.nonudi.operate
    Workflow classes for Non-UDI operate phase of the Aggregator.
    energy.usef.agr.workflow.operate.control.ads
    This package contains the Java components needed for the workflow 'Realize A-Plans and/or D-Prognoses by controlling Active Demand and Supply'.
    energy.usef.agr.workflow.operate.identifychangeforecast
    Classes for the identify changes in forecast workflow in the operate phase for the Aggregator.
    energy.usef.agr.workflow.operate.netdemand
    Package to contain workflow logic around Determining Net Demands
    energy.usef.agr.workflow.validate.flexoffer
    This package contains the logic to create and send FlexOffer's
    energy.usef.brp.workflow.plan.aplan.finalize
    Workflow classes for A-plan finalization in the plan phase of the BRP.
    energy.usef.brp.workflow.plan.commonreferencequery
    Contains java components to trigger the common reference query.
    energy.usef.brp.workflow.plan.flexorder.place
    This package contains the components needed for the implementation of the workflow describing the placement of Flex Orders on the BRP side.
    energy.usef.brp.workflow.settlement.send
    This package contains the java components and logic needed to send Settlement messages.
    energy.usef.dso.workflow.operate
    Operate classes of the Distribution System Operator.
    energy.usef.dso.workflow.plan.connection.forecast
    Connection forecast classes of the Distribution System Operator.
    energy.usef.dso.workflow.settlement.send
    This package contains the java components and logic needed to send Settlement messages.
    energy.usef.mdc.workflow
    Contains Workflow classes.
